subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
I acknowledge your mail, I have also received your details and authorization letter from Mr. Mohammed Ali Khalaf regarding to this transaction. Kindly fill the attached form and resend it back to us .Once we receive that we shall direct you on what to do next .

subject: Re:  Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Hamza,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I received your email and the details from Mr. Mohammed Ali Khalaf. I'm interested in learning more about what I need to do next. Could you please provide me with some additional information about the attached form? What is it for and why is it necessary?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Margarete
